references.paper_title: Swinir: Image restoration using swin transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces SwinIR, a state-of-the-art image restoration model based on the Swin Transformer architecture, which heavily influences the proposed UPS method.

references.paper_title: Image super-resolution using deep convolutional networks
references.reason: This foundational paper demonstrates the effectiveness of CNNs for single-image super-resolution (SISR), providing a basis for comparison and improvement.

references.paper_title: Lapar: Linearly-assembled pixel-adaptive regression network for single image super-resolution and beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces LAPAR, a lightweight and efficient SISR model that is a strong competitor to the UPS approach and provides a benchmark for comparison.

references.paper_title: Swin transformer: Hierarchical vision transformer using shifted windows
references.reason: This paper presents the Swin Transformer architecture, which is fundamental to the SwinIR model and provides the foundation for the attention mechanisms used in UPS.

references.paper_title: Restormer: Efficient transformer for high-resolution image restoration
references.reason: This paper introduces Restormer, another transformer-based model for image restoration, offering an alternative approach to image reconstruction and serving as a point of comparison for the UPS method.
